name: VICULUS DEMO
description:
WELCOME TO VICULUS OS. You will be heading to... [MOVEMENT DEMO]

Current Movement Demo for VICULUS.

Full Game and PROPER demo with actual levels available on Steam soon.

- Wallrun by jumping onto a wall and holding forward + directional key if wanted.

- Slide by holding left control.

- Dash with left shift.

- Change Sensitivity at the [MACHINE] with A and D. (Mouse currently does not work.)

BUGS: OF COURSE A LOT. (DONT TELL US THESE)

-Animations for the guns are wonky and sometimes not timed correctly.

-Switching guns on the go while still shooting might have gun behaviour on different gun model.

-No, any kind of "Super Jump Glitch" is not a bug. Any movement related things that are -POSSIBLE- are intended for use. (This does not include boundry breaking movement bugs. Report those.)

-UI may be out of place dependent on your resolution. (1920x1080 is the default.)

-No, the animated model at the top of the starting building does not do anything. Just for testing. 

-Do NOT shoot the bleeding test ball with the card equipped. This breaks all guns. (Health script is not applied to player in this build.)

-Settings dont save. Will be implemented on proper demo.
